record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - February 06, 2008)

[Page: S751]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:32 p.m., recessed until Thursday, February 7, 2008, at 10:30 a.m.
